channel.description: Recent content in js on Avijit Gupta

item.title: Deep copying in JS!
item.description: The Problem Now-a-days, I’m working on the ringleader project. And just yesterday, me and one of my team mates Utkarsh observed that there were a couple of errors being generated in our javascript code. Some investigation revealed the source of errors to be a copy of an array which contained the same reference as the original array. Thus, a change in the copy was leading to a change in the original array as well.
